entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of rain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
